page.title: 14LAWRENCE WESTON SCHOOL
page.content: This is a{comprehensive school}for boys and girls aged between{11 and 18 {years.}Our Head Teacher is called Mrs. Whittington and there are three Deputy Heads. There are about{500 children}in the school. It is divided into seven years. Most of our pupils come from the immediate areas of Lawrence Weston and Sea Mills and either walk to school or come by public bus services. Pupils take{examinations}such as C.S.E. and G.C.E. "O" levels in the Fifth Year and G.C.E. "A" levels in the Sixth Form. There is also a special class for children who need help with reading and writing. There is a Library in the school. It is a {Public Library}as well as for the use of the school. We have to get a note to go to the Library at lunch times. I don't agree with this because after all it is a Public Library. L.W.School
